item.description:
LABOR DAY SPECTACULAR

SINGLES PARTAY WITH

THE IRA!!!!!



MARK YOU CALENDAR FOR



September 5- Saturday

2:00PM- ??



Fire pit Erupts @ 7:00ish





WHERE: The Fun House of The Ira



44 Dibble Hollow Lane, Windsor Locks 06096

Outdoor Event ONLY- Rain sadly postpones Partay.





PLAY TIME:



Personal introduction to each and ever person. Of course, name tags for all……..Plus, Ping Pong, Badminton, Bocce, Washer Toss, Foozball, Mancala, Frisbee, and Kadima. (Spin the Bottle & Adult Twister depending on intoxication levels )





YOU BRING:



A fun loving attitude, infectious smile, & a folding chair. Dress Code is very relaxed.





FUN PARTY DETAILS:



1. FOOD: Please bring a creative appetizer or dessert to impress others. (If you need suggestions, please let me know.)



Dinner will include: assorted, tantalizing foods served in mini-portions-



· Boneless Marinated Chicken

· Assorted Italian Specialties

· Homemade Garlic Bread



Other food surprises will be created and brought forth by The Ira.



(We start our diets on Tuesday)





2. THE EVER SO IMPORTANT LIBATION INFO: I will provide an award winning, Open Martini Bar! If you would like something else to drink- BYOB.



RSVP:



On or before- Friday, August 28.

Ira 860-604-5792 Mistrchrming@aol.com



Please Note:



Singles Only, Sorry No Couples. Limited to 60 Singles. I will do my best to have an equal number of man and women present.



If you are not sure if you are in a relationship, ask yourself, “Will I get upset if someone is chatting with the person I’m bringing, and ask them on a date?”
item.how_to_find_us: Many Cars Outfront of the House.......

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: LABOR DAY SPECTACULAR SINGLES PARTY HOSTED BY THE IRA
